p.s: In his speech, given at the summit opening ceremony in Glasgow on 1 November 2021, Boris Johnson talks about the necessity to take action in order to combat the climate change.
The audience is the COP26 members, so the representatives of many countries that meet for the UNUnited Nations climate conference in Glasgow.
Boris Johnson, the British Prime Minister, presents his idea of the climate crisis as an action film like James Bond.
The world is under great pressure to solve a vast problem that effects everyone.
He says that the climate change is rapidly moving on an that is why something has to happen now.
He refers to summits and conferences in the past where promises have been made but never have been realised.
In order to calm the angry and nervous crowd that is watching politics this is the time to get real about the crisis.
He states that the necessary funds already exist and now people need the will to act.
Therefore everyone has to work together and states need to help each other.
Furthermore he goes into the topic of all the young people and unborn individuals that will suffer from the failures of nowdaysnowadays generations.
Johnson wants to make a change so that humanity can look back at COP26 and appreciate their decissionsdecisions.
